column1: The Roll was a list of names created by Hobbits following the Battle of Bywater. The Roll contained all those hobbits who fought in the Battle of Bywater
column2: with Captains Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took appearing at the top of the list. Other Hobbits who fought were Samwise Gamgee
column5: Wilcome Cotton II and Bowman Cotton.

column1: In latter years the Roll was learned by heart by Shire-historians
column2: and the rise of fame and fortune of the Cotton Family dates from this time.
